nodes.text: Fiona Bruce : Well, I know you want to come back on this.  We actually have a question that addresses this point from Luke McCroy Jones.
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : Well, I know you want to come back on this.  We actually have a question that addresses this point from Luke McCroy Jones.
Luke McCroy Jones : So given the Covid-19 pandemic has disproportionately affected groups including the young, how should a Government /SHRU there is more support for luxury developments?
Assertive Questioning
the Covid-19 pandemic has disproportionately affected groups including the young, a Government /SHRU there should not more support for luxury developments
xiyuan: Luke McCroy Jones : So given the Covid-19 pandemic has disproportionately affected groups including the young, how should a Government /SHRU there is more support for luxury developments?

xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : assume you are referring to the Housing and Local Community Secretary, Robert Genrik, who has also been on the front page of the papers for a few days now, about this development in Tower Hamlets in London, which is now being reviewed, financed by Richard Desmond and his company?
Fiona Bruce : Robert Genrik, who has also been on the front page of the papers for a few days now,
Asserting
Robert Genrik has also been on the front page of the papers for a few days now
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : Robert Genrik, who has also been on the front page of the papers for a few days now,
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : this development in Tower Hamlets in London, which is now being reviewed,
Fiona Bruce : this development in Tower Hamlets in London, which is now being reviewed, financed by Richard Desmond and his company?
Asserting
this development in Tower Hamlets in London is now being reviewed, financed by Richard Desmond and his company
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : this development in Tower Hamlets in London, which is now being reviewed, financed by Richard Desmond and his company?
Fiona Bruce : I assume you are referring to the Housing and Local Community Secretary,
Assertive Questioning

Fiona Bruce assumes Luke McCroy Jones was referring to the Housing and Local Community Secretary, Robert Genrik, who has also been on the front page of the papers for a few days now, about this development in Tower Hamlets in London, which is now being reviewed, financed by Richard Desmond and his company
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : I assume you are referring to the Housing and Local Community Secretary,
Fiona Bruce : The question is about should the Government be doing more to support social and affordable housing.  Jess?
Pure Questioning
The question is about should the Government be doing more to support social and affordable housing or not
xiyuan: Fiona Bruce : The question is about should the Government be doing more to support social and affordable housing.  Jess?
Jess Phillips : Every government that has existed since probably, I'd say probably the 1970s should have done more to build social housing
Asserting
every government that has existed since the 1970s should have done more to build social housing
xiyuan: Jess Phillips : Every government that has existed since probably, I'd say probably the 1970s should have done more to build social housing
Jess Phillips : and to ensure that any stock that was lost for the sale of social housing was replaced at at least an equal value.
Asserting
every government that has existed since the 1970s should ensure that any stock that was lost for the sale of social housing was replaced at least an equal value
xiyuan: Jess Phillips : and to ensure that any stock that was lost for the sale of social housing was replaced at at least an equal value.
